release.action: Corrected SQL query for YEAR-filter
Corrected Validation method for disc.genre
Added New Resource objects to correct Russian translations
Migrated source code to Google Code project Jukes
Updated POM to use more dependencies found on IBiblio like Jasper, Hibernate, HSQLDB, JGoodies
Minor code cleanup of dead code
Defaulted the main view to have the Track Playlist instead of Disc playlist
Fixed maven build to build both Windows and Unix deployments
Updated: Jasper Reports 3.7.5
Fixed: Update Tags at Add Disc Dialog

release.description: Implementation of Hibernate 3.5.3, XML-import and export and some minor changes
release.action: Implementation of Hibernate 3.5.3-Final release
XML- export and import

release.description: Implementation of HyperSQL 2.0 and some minor changes
release.action: small modifications
New id3v24 processing
hsqldb 2.0.0
disclist table optimization
database update optimization

release.description: Multilingual Help, APE-files processing and some minor changes
release.action: Multilingual Help; English and Russian topics available
APE-files processing
Spectrum Analyzer is suspended
Volume control is added

release.description: FreeDB search, export to XML and some minor changes
release.action: FreeDB search
Export of DataBase to XML file

release.description: New version of Amazon search, and some minor changes
release.action: New version of Amazon search
Catalog Export - export in UTF-8 . Additional fields are added : year, genre, bitrate, location
Bitrate report - added report parameters : "From", "To"; New report design
Albums for Artist report - added Dialog to select Artist

release.description: List of discs, Jukes portability and some minor fixes
release.action: New functionality: List of discs
Add Single Track options added
Add Single Disc: Promt to select directory instead of track
Multi-Lingual Error Messaging System

Jukes portability added: All LOG-files are redirected to /log/ subdirectory in current Application directory; All default directories are redirected to current Application directory; All preferences are stored in jukes.xml file in current Application directory (System Register entry is used for compatibility);
Find and Add All discs mode: optimization of subdirectory recursing
New multilingual resources.
Filter panel: Artist and Disc filters are added to Filter panel. Exact Match flag is added to Filter panel.
Preferences: To speed up main tree initialisation new flag is added to Preferences - Show main tree by default. With this flag user can hide main tree and show filtered tree only.
Preferences: New "Update Audio Tags in files" flag is added to Preferences to allow user change database info without changing tags in music files.
Preferences: Check Genres tools is added to check genres of all discs for compliance with standard table of music genres.
Preferences: New option added to allow copying covers from discs directories to selected directory. It allows to show covers even when external discs are not connected.
Tag processing: Album Artist field is used for compilation albums. Appropriate parameter is added to Preferences.
Tag processing: Disc Number and Total Discs fields are used to process boxsets.
Preferences: New flag "Show Empty Node In Tree" is added to Preferences to allow user to show artists without discs.
New reports added - -Genres report to show all genres in Catalog. -Catalog by genres report -All Discs for selected Artist report.
Genres: Complicated descriptions of genres are allowed. Descriptions of genres must be of following format

Playlists: - adding a few selected discs and artists to playlist - re-paint empty playlist after playlist clearance - GoTo button for tree with active filter -playlist clearance - deleting current track
Search tools : - Select button for tree with active filter

Find discs: - "Errors only" flag is added ti allow user to hide all message except errors messages. - "All subdirectories successfully processed" message added to indicate the and of process. - System and hidden directories processing error was corrected -"readonly" files processing error was corrected
TCON (genre) tag processing: - iTunes-style tag "(NNN)" processing is added
Cover processing: -Smooth scaling added
Year tag processing: -If no Year is specified in tags then "9999" year is used instead of current year as it was in previous version.
DiscEditor: -Option for changing Artists for selected disc is added.
TrackEditor: -Disc is automatically deleted if all track are deleted for this disc.
Updated Russian Translation
Updated JFlac library to 1.3 because of freezing issues in 1.2
Fixed connection pooling to C3P0 in Hibernate and NoCacheProvider.
Updated JIntellitype to version 1.3.1
Updated various other libraries
Fixed Bug with images in JasperReports.
Fixed NullpointerException when setting playlist to shuffle with no songs in list.
Korean Language Translation.
Indonesian Language Translation.
Norwegian Language Translation.
French Language Translation.
Updated HSQLDB to 1.8.0.9.
Updated JIntellitype to version 1.3 which fixes race condition in DLL.
Fixed many minor issues caught by Findbugs.
Added call to JIntellitype.isJIntellitypeSupported to make sure it won't try and load on a 64 bit OS or a non-Windows OS.
Spanish Language translation.
As part of the Common Jukebox project Jukes will look for a Music folder at ./Music on first startup and add the music there.
Added tooltip to playlist when hovering shows you artist - album - track - duration
Added Vista manifest to EXE to allow User Access Control to run at highest privileges. This is required to run Jukes under Vista properly.
Fixed bug in global tag replacer in Disc Finder not updating album titles.
When adding albums with more than 100 tracks pad with 3 digits.
Fixed problem if Jukes was already running not shutting down new instance.
Updated Amazon Web service to latest version and removed Axis for HttpClient. This makes the searching more accurate, faster, and decreases the size of the executable.
JAudioTagger library to 1.0.8
Nimrod LF to 1.0.b
REMOVED: Hibernate caching to improve memory usage.
REMOVED: Entagged and ehCache JARS as dependencies.
REMOVED: Napkin Look and Feel. Too buggy, slow, and bloated.
Hibernate library to 3.2.5.ga
HSQLDB library to 1.8.0.8
Donation redirect right to Paypal page.
Fixed milliseconds in XSPF files.
Nimrod LF library to version 0.9.9 for JDK 16
L2FProd library to version 7.3
German translation now included if your JRE is set to German it will display in German.
JAudiotagger library to version 1.0.5
Hibernate library to version 3.2.4.ga
Common "InputLength = 1" error and many other ID3 Tag errors now fixed with latest JAudiotagger
Ability to perform Difference Tool case insensitively.
JAudiotagger library to version 1.0.4
Commons Lang library to version 2.3
Commons IO library to version 1.3.1
Hibernate library to version 3.2.2.ga
Added new report to display all albums with a bitrate less than a certain value
FINALLY fixed GUI lockup problem.
Added a Clear Playlist option to the playlist
Added preference for Spectrum Analyzer Mode. Either Off, Analyzer, or Scope.
Added KDE and Gnome desktop icons in the Unix.zip file to use in those environments.
Added some more checks for GUI lockups when adding songs to an empty playlist.
Fixed rare bug where if you had the last song selected and track changed and then you tried to remove that track from your playlist.
Updated copyright year to 1999-2007
Updated JGoodies Looks 2.1.2 which fixes native icons in File Open dialog.
REMOVED: Custom TableSorter for Java 6 TableRowSorter.
Added Catalog report and Albums Missing Cover Artwork reports under Reports menu.
Fixed issue on some Windows machines with System Clock speeding up.
Fixed GUI lockup and freeze issues (I think).
Fixed problem with Directory Chooser if you renamed directory on file system.
Fixed problem deleting or refreshing a disc with a Track that has been removed.
Switched to Java 6 TrayIcon
Right click menu on TrayIcon now works under Linux Gnome and KDE
Fixed Linux tray icon sizes to 24x24 for KDE to look right on both Windows and Linux.
Now displaying error when trying to play Layer I MP3 files that Javazoom player does not like.
Updated to JIntellitype 1.2 to handle only ONE instance of app on Windows.
REMOVED: com.jeans.trayicon and DLL. Now using JDK 6 trayicon
Java 6 is the minimum version required going forward
Tray Icon under Linux/Unix.(only pause, play, next song functionality)
Updated Look 2.1.1 which has Windows Vista and Java 6 UI improvements
Added DLL's to unix version in case user wants to run JAR version on Windows
Updated Hibernate 3.2.1.ga
Updated JIntellitype to 1.1
Fixed bug in tree search introduced by Looks 2.1.1
Only start playing song when queuing into playlist when the playlist is empty.
Save the current song playing in the playlist when Saving Playlist.
When clicking on the spectrum analyzer it would not turn off.
Right clicking on the tree view left everything selected.
Removed BrowserLauncher code and now uses Java 6 Desktop API to launch URLs
When playing FLAC files the tooltip on the Windows icon was null-null.
Updated SpectrumAnalyzer based on jlgui code version 3.0
Fixed Hibernate problem when deleting an album after editing it.
Updated for JDK1.5 warnings
Updated Hibernate to 3.2 GA Release.
When shuffling playlist, Play Immediate would just queue it in the list.
Added Napkin Look and Feel.
Updated L2Fprod after fixing Napkin look and feel bug.
Updated Jaudiotagger to 1.0.3.
Added Squareness Look and Feel.
Added NimROD Look and Feel.
Added Substance Look and Feel.
Updated JGoodies to 1.5.0.
Updated Commons Lang to 2.2
Proper handling of FLAC files. FLAC Icon in tree. Flacs play correctly.
Proper handling of OGG files. OGG Icon in tree. OGGs play correctly.
Removed ANNOTATION from XSPF playlists, its useless and just adds file size
Fixed problem with special characters in XSPF playlists that were not UTF-8.
Fixed ClassCastException on Statistics Dialog caused by Hibernate upgrade.
Fixed problem with double error dialogs if there was a Player error.
Added new JSpiff library to handle XSPF playlists
Added new Entagged library to handle OGG and FLAC tags
Removed old XSPF code and replaced with JSpiff
Updated HSQLDB to 1.8.0.7 and Log4j to 1.2.14
Rendering of search dialog did not look right.
Updated Hibernate versions.
Fixed many libraries to now include their licenses on the Project Dependencies page.
Fixed Jukes license to be proprietary Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 2.5.
WINDOWS ONLY: Added JIntellitype to listen for Intellitype keyboard commands like Winamp and Windows Media Player.
WINDOWS ONLY: Added global hotkey WINDOWS+J to bring up the Window even if it is minimized to the tray and hide it if it is showing.
Fixed bug when Queue Next from the treeview inserting the list backwards.
Fixed previous to go back to the beginning of the song, but if within 2 seconds goes to the previous track.
Updated Jaudiotagger which fixes problem with POPM frames in ID3V2.3 tags.
Updated splash screen, no album image, and website graphics.
Initial release to BETA testers.
